name: Zombie Road Rash
description:
Zombie Road Rash is an addictive zombie survival game!

The rule is simple-When zombies are following your car, you have no option but to escape from bloody & hungry zombie hordes otherwise you are dead.

Upgrade exclusive cars with more destructive weapons. Avail great powers to obliterate zombies coming in your way. You will survive only if you have stronger car & powerful weapons!

Engine is roaring; all guns are loaded! Hold your driver seat and get ready? Experience the exciting car racing game available in market.

Download & Race against your life now!

FEATURES:
- Challenging survival Mode
- Highly destructive Weapons
- Lots of exclusive Powers
- Zap zombies in 30 adventures levels.
- Powerful Cars to play
- Kill different kinds of zombies

You can watch video on YouTube as well. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qgaxFzixJbI
